title: The big downside to the rise of sports betting apps
description:
Maybe you shouldn't be able to bet your mortgage on your phone? Recode’s Peter Kafka explains.
Today’s episode was produced by Taylor Maycan. Mix is by Melissa Pons (Hemlock Creek Productions). Our host is Adam Clark Estes. Additional production support from Jon Ehrens. Amber Hall is our editorial director.
Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
